snippet.title: Black Mesa: Blue Shift | Focal Point Trailer
snippet.description:
Black Mesa: Blue Shift will recieve Focal Point update including chapter 5 and various improvements over all 4 previous chapters It will be available on 17.11.24!

Black Mesa: Blue Shift is being developed by HECU Collective
_________________

CREDITS
Trailer made by ALLAN:
https://www.youtube.com/AllanOfficial
Soundtrack for trailer composed by Paweł Perepelica:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wU-ptsti-jo
https://www.youtube.com/@weirdsoutherner
https://twitter.com/weirdsoutherner
_________________

LINKS
Our Discord:
https://discord.gg/uhdTxP5Cuw
Black Mesa: Blue Shift on ModDB:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-blue-shift-remake
Black Mesa: Blue Shift in Steam Workshop:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2424633574

SUPPORT US
HECU Collective Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/Hecu_collective
Your support really matters to us.

#remake #blueshift #blackmesa #halflife #xen
